atom
Class PrefixIgnorerInputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      atom.PrefixIgnorerInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable
public class PrefixIgnorerInputStream
extends InputStream

An input stream that ignores an optional prefix of the stream.

If the streams starts with the prefix, the prefix is ignored and the stream is URL-decoded.

If the stream does not start with the prefix, it is just passed through. No URL-decoding.

This implementation reads and caches the whole stream in the constructor: For large streams, that is inefficient.

Author:
BARCELONA\alexanderb
